## Introduction

This week will introduce how to conduct various types of testing of code, data, and models in ML systems using Python tools of pytest and great expectations.

## Learning Objectives

By the end of this week, you will be able to:

1. Understand the principle and types of testing in ML systems.
2. Can use ``pytest`` and ``great expectations`` to test ML code and data.
